name: terra-toolkit-utils
description: Utilities to help when developing terra modules.
author: Cerner Corporation

scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:compiled && npm run clean:dependencies
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean:all && npm install && npm run compile:build
scripts.compile: npm run clean:compiled && npm run compile:build
scripts.compile:build: ls; cd node_modules; ls; cd ../; babel src --out-dir lib --copy-files
